title: Justice, Fairness, and Mercy
summary: Deuteronomy 25 contains laws about justice in legal disputes, levirate marriage, fair weights and measures, and the command to remember Amalekâ€™s attacks. These laws promote fairness, kindness, and community order.

faq.question: What is levirate marriage?
faq.answer: When a man dies without children, his brother is to marry the widow to preserve the family line.

faq.question: What warning is given at the end of the chapter?
faq.answer: Israel is told to remember and one day blot out Amalek for attacking the weak from behind.
